title: Europa: A Cyberpunk Chronicle
description:
A failed mission sets off a conspiracy in this near-future Sci-Fi thriller.
NASA is preparing its first manned expedition to Europa and the world holds its collective breath—a last hope for a civilization that’s lost its way. Crewmember Luka Janovic is returning to base after TV interview when he is attacked by a weapon that shouldn’t exist. Next, his best friend disappears. While he hunts for signs of his friend, he learns that a private space corporation, NASA’s supposed partner in the Europa mission, plans to kill him.Desperate, Luka flees to the dangerous slums of former Seattle—now called Low City—and finds himself at the center of a twisted conspiracy. If he’s to survive he’ll need information, and allies. But with humanity’s future at stake—and trillions of dollars along with it—betrayal could be lurking in the place he least expects it.Europa is for fans of works like Altered Carbon by Richard K. Morgan and Do Androids Dream of Electric Sheep? By Philip K. Dick.The Europa Omnibus Edition includes Europa Books 1-3: Europa, Helena, and Viktoria.
author: Elias J. Hurst
